sentences.sContent: The new resort area has boosted tourism.
sentences.sCn: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

sentences.sContent: ...Agreeable people boost your confidence and allow you to relax and feel comfortable...
...Today's young adults were　raised by parents who made sure to boost their self-esteem at every turn...
...social contact can boost development of the brain and immune system...

trans.tranCn: 提高，使增长；推动，激励；替…做广告，宣扬
trans.tranOther: if a  rocket  or motor boosts a  spacecraft  , it makes it go up into space or go in a particular direction

trans.tranCn: 提高， 增长； 推动， 激励
trans.tranOther: an increase in the amount of power available to a  rocket  , piece of electrical equipment etc
